languages.text: "Вольный Торговец сослал кардинала Анвиласа с Даргонуса, чтобы тот принял смерть вдали от своей паствы и родного прихода. Экклезиархи мира-столицы официально порицают таковое несправедливое решение, толкуя его как еретическое намерение ослабить веру Даргонуса, лишив планету святого пастыря".

"The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец сослал кардинала Анвиласа с Даргонуса, чтобы тот принял смерть вдали от своей паствы и родного прихода. Экклезиархи мира-столицы официально порицают таковое несправедливое решение, толкуя его как еретическое намерение ослабить веру Даргонуса, лишив планету святого пастыря".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The Ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical intent to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

languages.text: “行商浪人将红衣主教安维拉斯从达戈努斯流放，让他在远离教区与信徒的地方死于非命。达戈努斯的国教教会正式谴责了这个违背公平原则的决定，认为这属于异端企图，试图通过杀害神圣的神职人员来削弱达戈努斯的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人将红衣主教安维拉斯从达戈努斯流放，让他在远离教区与信徒的地方死于非命。达戈努斯的国教教会正式谴责了这个违背公平原则的决定，认为这属于异端企图，试图通过杀害神圣的神职人员来削弱达戈努斯的信仰。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーはアンビラス枢機卿をダルゴナスから追放し、彼自身の教区と信徒から遠く離れた地で死を迎えるようにしました。首都惑星の帝国聖教会はこの不当な決定を公式に非難しています。彼らはこれを神聖なプリーチャーを失わせることでダルゴナスの信仰を弱体化させようとする、異端的な試みだと解釈しています」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーはアンビラス枢機卿をダルゴナスから追放し、彼自身の教区と信徒から遠く離れた地で死を迎えるようにしました。首都惑星の帝国聖教会はこの不当な決定を公式に非難しています。彼らはこれを神聖なプリーチャーを失わせることでダルゴナスの信仰を弱体化させようとする、異端的な試みだと解釈しています」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} verbannte Kardinal Anvylas von Dargonus, sodass er entfernt von seiner Gemeinde und seiner Herde den Tod fände. Die Ekklesiarchen der Hauptwelt verurteilten offiziell diese ungerechte Entscheidung und erklärten sie zu einem ketzerischen Versuch, den Glauben auf Dargonus dadurch zu schwächen, dass sie dem Planeten einen heiligen Prediger entzog."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} verbannte Kardinal Anvylas von Dargonus, sodass er entfernt von seiner Gemeinde und seiner Herde den Tod fände. Die Ekklesiarchen der Hauptwelt verurteilten offiziell diese ungerechte Entscheidung und erklärten sie zu einem ketzerischen Versuch, den Glauben auf Dargonus dadurch zu schwächen, dass sie dem Planeten einen heiligen Prediger entzog."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, Kardinal Anvylas'ı cemaati ve sürüsünden ırak düşüp eceliyle yüzleşsin diye Dargonus'tan sürgün etti. Başdünyanın ekleşiarkları, gezegeni kutsal bir vaizden mahrum bırakarak inancı zayıflatmaya tevessül eden bu haksız kararı resmen lanetledi."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, Kardinal Anvylas'ı cemaati ve sürüsünden ırak düşüp eceliyle yüzleşsin diye Dargonus'tan sürgün etti. Başdünyanın ekleşiarşileri, gezegeni kutsal bir vaizden mahrum bırakarak inancı zayıflatmaya tevessül eden bu haksız kararı resmen lanetledi."

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente exilió al cardenal Anvylas de Dargonus para que muriera lejos de su parroquia y su rebaño. Los eclesiarcas del mundo capital han condenado oficialmente esta injusticia y la interpretan como un intento herético de debilitar la fe de Dargonus despojando al planeta de un santo predicador».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente exilió al cardenal Anvylas de Dargonus para que muriera lejos de su parroquia y su rebaño. Los eclesiarcas del mundo capital han condenado oficialmente esta injusticia y la interpretan como un intento herético de debilitar la fe de Dargonus despojando al planeta de un santo predicador».

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a exilé le cardinal Anvylas de Dargonus afin qu'il trouve la mort loin de sa paroisse et de ses ouailles. Les ecclésiastiques du monde-capitale ont officiellement condamné cette décision injuste, qu'ils considèrent comme une manœuvre hérétique visant à affaiblir la foi de Dargonus en privant la planète d'un saint prédicateur. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader exiled Cardinal Anvylas from Dargonus so that he would meet his death away from his parish and flock. The ecclesiarchs of the capital world officially condemn this unfair decision, which they interpret as a heretical attempt to weaken Dargonus's faith through bereaving the planet of a holy preacher."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a exilé le cardinal Anvylas de Dargonus afin qu'il trouve la mort loin de sa paroisse et de ses ouailles. Les ecclésiastiques du monde-capitale ont officiellement condamné cette décision injuste, qu'ils considèrent comme une manœuvre hérétique visant à affaiblir la foi de Dargonus en privant la planète d'un saint prédicateur. »
